Text:
This includes some things from the 2nd disk that might interest people:
Deleted Scenes never before seen!  "The Diamond in the Husks" - a visit to the 'Field of Dreams' which still exists today! and "Field of Dreams: Roundtable" - Kevin Costner,Bret Saberhagen and other former major league players talk baseball,dreams,ambition the film and fathers and sons. Enjoy and seed!!
